name: TheWeeklyComet
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Add weekly comedic and satirical content by adding The Weekly Comet to your flash briefing. The Weekly Comet is a satirical paper from the fictional City of Comets. Please note that this skill contents are entirely fictional and should not be taken as actual news content.

Available Sections: Top Stories, Rising Stocks, Tech Ruminations, Spurts.
Updated every Tuesday.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
